类 HttpMirrorControl

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Searchable, TestElement

    public class HttpMirrorControl
extends AbstractTestElement
    Test element that implements the Workbench HTTP Mirror function For unit tests, @see TestHttpMirrorControl

      • canRemove

        public boolean canRemove()
        从类复制的说明: AbstractTestElement
        Called by Remove to determine if it is safe to remove the element. The element can either clean itself up, and return true, or the element can return false.
        指定者:
        canRemove 在接口中 TestElement
        覆盖:
        canRemove 在类中 AbstractTestElement
        返回:
        true if safe to remove the element
